author: glenn
msg: Make Ant javac fork the default

author: remm
msg: - Due to continued problems with javac, I think fork should default to true.

author: remm
msg: - To support nested tags, we should also visit child nodes.

author: glenn
msg: Implement new Ant javac fork option.
If set to true Ant forks a new process to compile JSP pages
and does it without synchronization. Default is false.

author: glenn
msg: Implement new Ant javac fork option.
